author: Associated Press
title: New York City’s School System, the Largest in the Country, Will Close for Rest of the Year Due to COVID-19
description: New York City's 1.1 million-pupil public school system will stay closed as the city struggles to contain the coronavirus outbreak.
content:
(NEW YORK) — New York City’s 1.1 million-pupil public school system will be closed for the rest of the school year as the city struggles to contain the coronavirus outbreak, Mayor Bill de Blasio announced Saturday.
